about_the_game:
Embark on an adrenaline-fueled 4v1 survivor experience in 7 Days Blood Moons, developed by The Fun Pimps, creators of 7 Days to Die, and iLLOGIKA. The game brings a unique combination of FPS, survival horror, RTS, tower defense and a robust progression system.

Will you become a brave survivor or will you crush all humanity’s hopes?

Game Features

  • Choose: Be one of the brave survivors and fight for what remains of humanity or be the dominating Zombie Hive Master and purge all humanity on earth.

Survivors

As survivors you’ll survive, scavenge, build, progress, craft, and customize to live another day.
  • Survive: Work with other survivors to mow down hordes of zombies, repair your defenses and heal your fallen teammates to last until morning.
  • Scavenge: Search your surroundings for useful building supplies, ammunition and health kits to prepare for the night. Find rare resources to craft, unlock better gear for your next match.
  • Build: Locate and fortify a nearby structure with the resources you scavenged. Lay down traps and bolster your defenses as waves of the undead come for you in this destructible voxel world.
  • Progress: Pick your loadout from a large arsenal of unlockable unique weapons and perks to prepare for your next match.
  • Craft: Get more firepower and hit harder by crafting and unlocking new weapons. Craft and unlock new constructibles to bolster your defenses for your next match.
  • Customize: Pick and choose your unique look from a wide variety of character customization options. Dress your character to show your style choosing unique outfit pieces from a wide variety of clothing options.

Zombie Hive Master

As the Zombie Hive Master, you’ll strategize, command, possess, harvest, and progress in this thrilling genre mash-up.
  • Strategize: From the sky in command view, search and find the survivors' base. Plan where your horde will be summoned from and dominate the field by giving them orders.
  • Command: Give orders to your horde to strategize a coordinated attack.
  • Possess: Take possession of zombies in third person to fight the survivors on the field.
  • Harvest: Harvest human remains to unlock new zombie minions to unleash in your next match.
  • Progress: Choose from a wide variety of unlockable zombie archetypes with unique special abilities to help crush the survivors in your next match.

short_description: 7 Days Blood Moons is a 4v1 fight to the death. Survivors fortify bases and scavenge for materials in their plight against the relentless horde. The Zombie Hive Master commands and possesses the horde to crush the survivors. Who will prevail?
